text: The Odds Against is a 1966 American short documentary film directed by Lee R. Bobker. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==See also== * Psychiatric Nursing * The Revolving Door ==References== ==External links== * *Watch The Odds Against on YouTube Category:1966 films Category:1960s documentary films Category:American films Category:English- language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about incarceration in the United States Category:Films directed by Lee R. Bobker
title: The Odds Against
